001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.viewmodel;
002
003import android.util.Log;
004import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
005import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
006import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleObserver;
007import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
008import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
009import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
010import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
011import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Ranking;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service.RankingsRepository;
014import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
015import java.util.List;
016import javax.inject.Inject;
017
018@HiltViewModel
019public class RankingsViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
020
021  private static final String TAG = RankingsViewModel.class.getSimpleName();
022
023  private final RankingsRepository repository;
024  private final MutableLiveData<List<Ranking>> rankings;
025  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
026  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
027
028  @Inject
029  public RankingsViewModel(RankingsRepository repository) {
030    this.repository = repository;
031    rankings = new MutableLiveData<>();
032    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
033    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
034    // FIXME Remove the line below
035    fetch(4, 2);
036  }
037
038  public LiveData<List<Ranking>> getRankings() {
039    return rankings;
040  }
041
042  public LiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
043    return throwable;
044  }
045
046  public void fetch(int codeLength, int gamesThreshold) {
047    throwable.setValue(null);
048    pending.clear();
049    repository.getRankings(codeLength, gamesThreshold)
050        .subscribe(
051            value -> {
052              rankings.postValue(value);
053            },
054            this::postThrowable,
055            pending
056        );
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  public void onStop(@NonNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
061    pending.clear();
062  }
063
064  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
065    Log.e(TAG, throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
066    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
067  }
068
069}
